thread.title: Trail Blazers sideline reporter gets completely startled by Pierre the Pelican
thread.title_full: Trail Blazers sideline reporter gets completely startled by Pierre the Pelican

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Trail Blazers sideline reporter gets completely startled by Pierre the Pelican
text:
Never trust a mascot.
Typically Pierre the Pelican isn’t too scary of a mascot, but try telling that to Portland Trail Blazers sideline reporter, Brooke Olzendam, when she’s focused.
imagine if this was king cake baby pic.twitter.com/7nDUbvaVCg 
— James Herbert (@outsidethenba) March 15, 2017 In all fairness, Brooke should be on high alert while in New Orleans. King Cake Baby lives there and could be seen at any moment. If you thought this was coming to get you, you’d scream too.
Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports And let’s not forget that Pierre used to look like this not so long ago.
Brooke had every reason to be suspicious of the mascot sneaking up on her.
@CSNNW TRUE! Blaze is the only one I can trust.
— Brooke Olzendam (@brookeolzendam) March 15, 2017
